detectors.description:
hdPoolDAI.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#923-962) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-r = (balance().mul(_shares)).div(totalSupply()) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#924)
	-tokenToBuyHDCORE = r.mul(HDCOREMin).div(HDCOREMax) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#942)

detectors.description:
hdPoolDAI.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#896-909) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalSupply() == 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#903)

hdPoolDAI.withdraw(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#923-962) ignores return value by OneSplitAudit(onesplit).swap(address(token),address(HDCORE),tokenToBuyHDCORE,_expectedAfterSlippage,_distribution,0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#954)

	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#518-520) (function)

	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#526-528) (function)

Reentrancy in hdPoolDAI.deposit(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#896-909):
	External calls:
	- token.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#899)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#908)
		- _balances[account] = _balances[account].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#687)
	- _mint(msg.sender,shares) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#908)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/hdPoolDAI__1.sol#686)
